title: About
description:
Hi!
My name is Yanir Seroussi. This website/blog is mostly meant to group together stuff I write in various places. It’s mainly focused on data science.
I’m an experienced data scientist and software engineer with a strong background in computer science, programming, machine learning, and statistics. My work spans the full spectrum from solving isolated data problems to building production systems that serve millions of users. I’ve produced top results in various areas such as recommender systems, text mining, price forecasting, and personalisation.
